Additional notes
B. Schenker reunited Viva in June 2007.

Viva are considered, together with Accept and Trance, to be one of the first ``real`` metal bands in Germany.
Guitarist Kai Reuter was 15 years old, when he recorded the ``Born To Rock`` album with the band.

Singer Marco Paganini has pursued a succesful solo career, after he has left the band.

Barbara Schenker is the sister of Michael and Rudolf Schenker of Scorpions fame.

Barbara Schenker is founder of Rock Band VIVA .She wrote most of the VIVA music.March &#039;85 Barbara Schenker was voted best Keyboarder by METAL HAMMER MAGAZINE
